snippet: Steve McMichael is a stunt coordinator for the film and television industry. He enjoys flying less than he used to.
abstract: Frequent flier column features television and film stunt coordinator Steve McMichael, who enjoys flying far less than he used to.
lead_paragraph: Steve McMichael is a stunt coordinator for the film and television industry. He enjoys flying less than he used to.

headline.main: Intrepid on the Set, but Rattled by Frail Planes
headline.print_headline: Intrepid on the Set, but Rattled by Frail Planes
